    Interface IMatchFormatter

    Implement this interface to apply a custom highlight style for more complex scenarios e.g., code editors.

    Namespace: BionicCode.Controls.Net.Core.Wpf
    Assembly: BionicCode.Controls.Net.Core.Wpf.dll
    Syntax
    public interface IMatchFormatter

    Methods

    | Improve this Doc View Source

    FormatMatch(MatchInfo, HighlightArgs)

    Executes when the HighlightRichTextBox highlights found matches.

    Declaration
    void FormatMatch(MatchInfo matchInfo, HighlightArgs args)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    MatchInfo matchInfo

    A MatchInfo that contains the match to give access to the actual System.Windows.Documents.TextRange.
    HighlightArgs args

    A HighlightArgs that holds the current configured highlight formatting attributes of the HighlightRichTextBox and a reference to the actual HighlightRichTextBox.
